items.title: Yale Climate Connections: Climate Change Status in 2026
items.summary: Clean energy sources accounted for over 90% of US new power capacity additions in 2025. China installed more solar and wind power in 2025 (over 300 GW) than the US has in its entire history. Energy Permitting Reform Act could reduce US climate pollution by 6.5 billion tons between 2030-2050.
items.raw_content: American lawmakers have been engaging in bipartisan negotiations to speed up energy infrastructure permitting processes for over three years. The Energy Permitting Reform Act could reduce U.S. climate pollution by approximately 6.5 billion tons between 2030 and 2050 by expediting transmission line approvals. Clean energy sources deployed predominantly on private lands accounted for over 90% of the country's new power capacity additions in 2025. China installed more solar and wind power in 2025 (well over 300 gigawatts of capacity) than the U.S. has in its entire history.

items.title: AI Policy Expert Predictions for 2026
items.summary: 2026 will be the year of enforcement and red lines in AI regulation, not just new declarations. Children have died from AI chatbot interactions, demanding proactive prevention. Federal-state tension as Trump's executive order challenges state AI laws. AI described as history's largest speculative bubble with data center electricity demands threatening utility costs.
items.raw_content: Marc Rotenberg warns that 2026 will test whether democracies can prohibit harmful applications like biometric mass surveillance. Amina Fazlullah emphasizes children have died from AI chatbot interactions, demanding proactive prevention measures. Adam Billen identifies states' rights as the dominant 2026 battleground. Tyson Slocum characterizes AI as history's largest speculative bubble, with data center electricity demands threatening utility costs unless federal fast-tracking stops.

items.title: CES 2026: Physical AI Robots Replace Dancing Robots
items.summary: CES 2026 marked dramatic shift from entertainment robots to practical working machines. Robots now carry loads, fold laundry, prepare coffee. Physical AI identified as third cost revolution after internet and generative AI, reducing marginal cost of physical labor toward zero. Critical for South Korea given demographic decline.
items.raw_content: The 2026 CES showcased a dramatic departure from previous years. Rather than dancing robots or robots designed for entertainment, this year's exhibits featured practical, working machines: robots carrying loads, folding laundry, and preparing coffee. Three major economic shifts: 1) Internet era eliminated information distribution costs, 2) Generative AI (2023+) reduced knowledge production expenses, 3) Physical AI (2026) lowering marginal cost of physical labor toward zero. Given demographic decline and labor shortages, physical AI may prove uniquely critical as an oxygen supply for South Korea's infrastructure.

items.title: UN WESP 2026: Global Economic Growth to Slow Amid Trade Tensions
items.summary: Global economic output forecast to grow 2.7% in 2026, below 2.8% in 2025 and well below pre-pandemic 3.2%. US tariff rate rose from 2.4% (end 2024) to 16.8% (Nov 2025). New tariff regime will reduce global GDP by 0.7% and US GDP by 1.2% by 2026. US-China trade down 35% from year ago.
items.raw_content: Global economic output is forecast to grow by 2.7% in 2026, slightly below the 2.8% estimated for 2025 and well below the pre-pandemic average of 3.2%. The average US tariff rate has risen sharply, moving from roughly 2.4% at the end of 2024 to around 16.8% by the end of November 2025. The new tariff regime will reduce global GDP by roughly 0.7% by 2026 and real US GDP by 1.2% by 2026. US-China trade is down more than 35% from a year ago.

items.title: IBM Declares 2026 Quantum Advantage Milestone at CES
items.summary: IBM publicly stated 2026 will mark first time quantum computer outperforms classical computer. Ford Otosan reduced 1,000-vehicle scheduling from 30 minutes to under 5 minutes using D-Wave hybrid quantum solver. BASF cut production scheduling from 10 hours to 5 seconds. D-Wave acquired Quantum Circuits Inc. for $550M to accelerate dual-rail system launch in 2026.
items.raw_content: IBM이 CES 2026에서 2026년 말까지 강력한 양자 우위(quantum advantage) 달성을 공식 예측했다. Ford Otosan은 D-Wave의 하이브리드 양자 솔버를 도입해 1,000대 차량 스케줄링 시간을 30분에서 5분 미만으로 단축했으며, BASF는 생산 스케줄링 시간을 10시간에서 5초로 줄였다. D-Wave는 1월 6일 Quantum Circuits Inc.를 총 5억5000만 달러에 인수하여 2026년 듀얼 레일 시스템 출시를 앞당겼다.

items.title: Andreessen Horowitz Raises $15B+ for AI and Strategic Technologies
items.summary: Andreessen Horowitz raised over $15 billion across five new venture funds, one of the sector's largest fundraising efforts amid accelerating AI adoption. Represents major capital commitment to AI and strategic technologies.
items.raw_content: Andreessen Horowitz raised more than $15 billion across five new venture funds, which represents one of the sector's largest fundraising efforts amid accelerating adoption of artificial intelligence.

items.title: DeepSeek's Breakthrough AI Training Method for 2026
items.summary: DeepSeek published paper outlining Manifold-Constrained Hyper-Connections framework to improve AI scalability while reducing computational and energy demands. Analysts call it a 'striking breakthrough' for the industry. Chinese AI firm competing with OpenAI despite limited access to Nvidia chips.
items.raw_content: DeepSeek published a paper outlining a more efficient approach to developing AI, illustrating the Chinese artificial intelligence industry's effort to compete with the likes of OpenAI despite a lack of free access to Nvidia Corp. chips. The document, co-authored by founder Liang Wenfeng, introduces a framework it called Manifold-Constrained Hyper-Connections designed to improve scalability while reducing the computational and energy demands of training advanced AI systems. Analysts told Business Insider the approach is a striking breakthrough that could have a massive impact on the industry.

items.title: Korea AI Basic Law Implementation Starting January 22, 2026
items.summary: Korea's AI Basic Law takes effect January 22, 2026, making Korea the second country after EU with comprehensive AI regulatory framework. High-impact AI and generative AI providers face new obligations. AI-generated content must be labeled. Grace period for enforcement likely extends to 2027.
items.raw_content: 2024년 12월 26일 국회 본회의에서 '인공지능 발전과 신뢰 기반 조성 등에 관한 기본법'(AI 기본법)이 통과되었으며, 2026년 1월 22일부터 본격 시행되어 한국이 EU에 이어 세계에서 두 번째로 포괄적인 AI 규제 체계를 갖추게 된다. 고영향 AI·생성형 AI 사업자에게 의무사항이 부과된다. AI 생성물 표시 의무화 방안이 추진되고 있다. 법적으로는 2026년 1월부터 의무가 발생하지만, 실제 과태료가 부과되는 시점은 빨라도 2027년 이후가 될 가능성이 높다.

items.title: Gen Z Job Mobility Reaches Record High - 57% Plan Job Changes in 2026
items.summary: 57% of US Gen Z workers plan to change jobs in 2026, with pay and career growth as top priorities. Gen Z expected to account for 27% of workforce by 2026. Average job tenure in first five years is just 1.1 years. 83% identify as job-hoppers. 77% prioritize work-life balance. 70% say mental health needs most attention.
items.raw_content: Gen Z is expected to account for 27% of the workforce by 2026. Gen Z's average job tenure in their first five years is just 1.1 years. 83% of Gen Z workers identify as job-hoppers, often in pursuit of better pay. 77% of Generation Z prioritize work-life balance. Gen Z prioritizes flexibility in where and when they work, valuing control over their work schedule, remote work options, and healthy work-life integration. 70% of Gen-Zers say their mental health needs the most attention or improvement.

items.title: Gen Z Embraces 'Year of the Analog' - Intentional Living Movement
items.summary: 2026 represents the 'Year of the Analog' for Gen Z - less about looking back and more about slowing down. Clear desire for experiences that feel tactile, intentional and real. Many rediscovering analog habits like handwriting letters. Gen Z emphasizes authenticity, intentionality over digital stimulation. Major theme is intentional living and emotional grounding.
items.raw_content: A major theme for Gen Z in 2026 is intentional living and emotional grounding, as they face the noise of constant digital stimulation and economic pressures. Many are rediscovering analog habits—like handwriting letters—and curating personal spaces that feel restorative. There's a clear desire, especially among Gen Z and Gen Alpha, for experiences that feel tactile, intentional and real. 2026 represents the analog trend as less about looking back and more about slowing down. Gen Z emphasizes authenticity, intentionality, and digital savvy, actively shaping culture around emotional well-being, meaningful connection, and creative expression.

items.title: Vogue Korea: 6 Wellness Trends Leading 2026
items.summary: Six major wellness trends for 2026: 1) Workplace wellness becomes essential (30% higher stress resilience for leaders prioritizing health), 2) AI meets ancient wisdom (DNA testing + sleep trackers), 3) Contrast therapy/bio-hacking goes mainstream (sauna market to grow from $1.2B to $3.5B by 2035), 4) Power of breath (Pranayama techniques), 5) Digital detox with Faraday bags, 6) Longevity with soul (spiritual practitioners show 33% higher longevity rates).
items.raw_content: 1) Workplace Wellness - Health is now essential rather than optional in professional settings. Leaders prioritizing sleep, meditation, and exercise show 30% higher stress resilience. 2) AI Meeting Ancient Wisdom - Technology combines modern diagnostic tools like sleep trackers with clinical knowledge such as DNA testing. 3) Contrast Therapy/Bio Hacking - The home sauna market is projected to grow from $1.2 billion (2024) to $3.5 billion (2035). 4) The Power of Breath - Conscious breathing techniques like Pranayama gain popularity. 5) Digital Detox - Using signal-blocking Faraday bags reconnects people to the present moment. 6) Longevity with Soul - Research shows spiritual practitioners have 33% higher longevity rates.

items.title: Sound Healing and Vagus Nerve Stimulation Lead 2026 Wellness Tech
items.summary: Sound healing using chimes, gongs and crystal bowls becoming increasingly popular in mainstream settings like David Lloyd and Virgin Active. Vagus nerve becomes key focus with neuroscience-engineered wearables (Sona, Yōjō) potentially becoming next trillion-pound health industry. VR healthcare market forecast to grow 30% per year through 2030 with immersive meditation and virtual spas.
items.raw_content: Sound baths, astrology sessions, moon ceremonies, and star bathing have made a resurgence, offering connection with nature and the cosmos. Sound healing is set to strike a chord in 2026 with immersive experiences using chimes, gongs and crystal bowls, becoming increasingly popular as people crave rest and relaxation, now available in mainstream settings like David Lloyd and Virgin Active. items.title: Korea's 2026 Economic Policy - Minimum Wage Rises 2.9%
items.source_name: Ministry of Economy and Finance Korea
items.summary: 2026 minimum wage increased 2.9% to 10,320 won per hour (from 10,030 won in 2025). Basic livelihood security selection criteria raised (1-person household 7.2%, 4-person household 6.51%). Unlimited K-Pass card introduced for all public transportation refunds. Student loan eligibility expanded to all university students from January.
items.raw_content: 2026년 최저임금은 2025년(1만30원) 대비 2.9% 인상된 시간당 1만320원으로 결정. 1월부터 기초생활보장제도 급여별 선정기준액이 되는 기준 중위소득이 인상(1인 가구 7.2%, 4인 가구 6.51%). 1월부터 취업 후 상환 학자금대출 중 등록금 대출 신청대상을 모든 대학(원)생으로 확대. 1월부터는 환급 기준 금액을 초과해 대중교통비 지출 시 초과분에 대해 모두 돌려받을 수 있는 무제한 K-패스 카드('모두의 카드')가 새롭게 도입.

items.title: KIEP 2026 World Economic Forecast: Buffered Slowdown Amid Asymmetric World
items.source_name: Korea Institute for International Economic Policy
items.summary: KIEP forecasts 2026 world economic growth at 3.0%, same as 2025. Theme: 'Buffered Slowdown amid an Asymmetric World'. Supply chain strategic restructuring, export market diversification, and AI technology investment boom act as buffering mechanisms preventing sharp recession. Key risks: new tariff/trade order upheaval, weakened fiscal capacity, AI investment concentration causing financial market chaos.
items.raw_content: KIEP는 2026년 세계경제 성장률을 3.0%로 전망했으며, 이는 2025년과 동일한 수준이다. 2026년 세계경제의 키워드는 '완충된 둔화, 비대칭의 시대(Buffered Slowdown amid an Asymmetric World)'로 제시되었다. 공급망의 전략적 재편, 수출시장 다변화, AI 등 기술 투자 붐이 경제의 충격을 흡수하는 '완충 기제(Buffering mechanisms)'로 작용해 급격한 경기 침체를 막았다. 주요 리스크 요인으로 신(新)관세·무역 질서의 급변, 재정 여력 약화에 따른 위기 대응능력 저하, AI 등에 대한 기술 투자 쏠림과 금융시장 혼란 및 투자 위축 등이 제시되었다.

items.title: Trump Tariffs Impact: Korea Economic Growth Slows to 1.8% in 2026
items.summary: UN warns Trump tariff impacts will become more evident in 2026. Korea's economic growth rate projected at 1.8% for 2026, 2.0% for 2027. In January 2026, US Commerce Department issued preliminary dumping determination on Korean chemical products (monomers, oligomers). Global trade system restructuring rather than collapsing after 9 months of Trump's trade war.
items.raw_content: 유엔은 지난해에는 트럼프 대통령이 4월 대부분의 교역 상대국에 부과한 관세 충격을 세계 경제가 흡수했지만, 그 영향은 2026년에 더욱 뚜렷해질 것이라고 밝혔다. 한국 경제 성장률은 2026년 1.8%, 2027년 2.0%로 제시됐다. 해를 넘긴 2026년 1월, 미국 상무부는 한국산 화학제품(모노머, 올리고머)에 대하여 덤핑이라는 취지의 예비 판정을 내 놓았다. 도널드 트럼프 미국 대통령이 2025년 봄 자유무역과의 전쟁을 선포한 지 9개월이 지났다. 글로벌 무역 시스템은 붕괴 대신 새로운 경로를 찾아 재구조화되고 있다.

LG's OLED evo W6 Wallpaper TV features 9mm thick panel with Zero Connect Box delivering wireless video up to 10 meters. LG's G6 flagship 20% brighter than G5, world's first 120Hz cloud gaming TV.
items.raw_content: Micro RGB emerged as one of the most talked-about TV developments at CES 2026. items.title: Korea 2026 Climate Budget: 19.16 Trillion Won, 9.9% Increase

items.summary: Korea's 2026 climate and energy budget set at 19.1662 trillion won, 9.9% increase from previous year. AI-based distributed power grid industry development receives 217.1 billion won including community solar (98.4 billion won). Renewable energy financial support increased from 326.3 billion won (2025) to 648 billion won (2026). Government pursuing full-scale deployment of 100GW renewable energy.
items.raw_content: The Ministry of Climate, Energy and Environment's 2026 budget has been set at 19.1662 trillion won, representing a 9.9% increase from the previous year. Renewable energy financial support increased from 326.3 billion won (2025) to 648 billion won (2026). The government is pursuing the full-scale deployment of 100GW of renewable energy.

items.title: EU Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) Definitive Regime Begins January 1, 2026
items.summary: EU CBAM definitive regime scheduled for January 1, 2026, requiring exporters to provide embedded emissions data. Simplified SFDR rules apply from January 1, 2026. EU Taxonomy Regulation updated with materiality thresholds and streamlined templates. Some 40 jurisdictions decided to use or incorporate ISSB standards, covering nearly 60% of global GDP.
items.raw_content: The EU Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) definitive regime is scheduled for January 1, 2026, requiring exporters to provide embedded emissions data. Simplified SFDR rules are due to apply from January 1, 2026. The EU Taxonomy Regulation is being updated with materiality thresholds and streamlined templates that apply from January 1, 2026. Some 40 jurisdictions have decided to use, or are moving to incorporate, the International Sustainability Standards Board (ISSB) standards into their regulatory frameworks, covering nearly 60% of global GDP.

items.title: US Crypto Regulation 2026: CLARITY Act Senate Markup in January

House passed bill in July 2025 with strong bipartisan support. GENIUS Act created federal framework for payment stablecoins, with regulators expected to finalize licensing, custody, capital, and compliance requirements by mid-2026. CFTC to wrap up crypto sprint by August 2026.
items.raw_content: Senate committee markups for the CLARITY Act are scheduled for January 2026, representing a critical milestone for crypto market structure legislation. items.title: SpaceX Launches COSMO-SkyMed and Pandora Space Telescopes (Jan 2-11, 2026)
items.summary: SpaceX launched COSMO-SkyMed Second Generation FM3 satellite January 2, 2026, marking first orbital launch of 2026. Satellite uses synthetic aperture radar (SAR) in X-band for all-weather imaging at 620 km altitude. NASA launched Pandora small space telescope January 11 to study exoplanet atmospheres, plus two CubeSat telescopes (SPARCS and BlackCAT). SpaceX completed 29 Starlink satellites on January 9, third mission of year.
items.raw_content: SpaceX launched the Cosmo-SkyMed Second Generation Flight Model 3 satellite on January 2, 2026, from Vandenberg Space Force Base in California, marking the first orbital launch of 2026. The satellite operates in a Sun-synchronous orbit at 620 km altitude and uses synthetic aperture radar (SAR) operating in X-band for all-weather imaging. On January 11, NASA launched the Pandora small space telescope to study exoplanet atmospheres, along with two CubeSat-type space telescopes (SPARCS and BlackCAT). SpaceX launched 29 Starlink broadband satellites from Florida's Space Coast on January 9, 2026.

items.title: AI Healthcare Transitions from Hype to Reality in 2026
items.summary: Medical AI transitions from hype to reality in 2026, with real-world evidence exposing bias and workflow fit issues. 2026 predicted to mark year AI moves beyond hype to become integrated and measurable driver of personalized cancer care. CRISPR-GPT can design experiments in months rather than years. First fully personalized CRISPR treatment administered to six-year-old child in mid-2025, momentum continues into 2026.
items.raw_content: Medical AI is transitioning from hype to reality in 2026, with real-world evidence exposing issues like bias and workflow fit, which will help separate substantive AI tools from overhyped ones and accelerate clinically validated systems. 2026 is predicted to mark the year AI moves beyond hype to become an integrated and measurable driver of personalized cancer care. In mid-2025, Stanford researchers unveiled CRISPR-GPT, an AI that can design CRISPR experiments in months rather than years, and scientists administered the first fully personalized CRISPR treatment to a six-year-old child.

items.title: MZ Generation Labor Market: Rising 'Resting' Population Reaches 5.6%
items.summary: 'Resting' population increased from 3.2% (123만 명) in 2005 to 5.6% (254만 명) in 2025 of working-age population. Labor market dual structure deepening: excessive competition for quality jobs in large companies/public institutions vs. shortage in SMEs/difficult jobs. Some MZ generation experiencing delayed employment or giving up, remaining in career interruption/job abandonment state. New job categories emerging: pet sitters, pet trainers, pet funeral directors.
items.raw_content: 2005년 당시 15세 이상 생산가능인구의 3.2%(123만 명) 수준이었던 '쉬었음' 인구는 2015년 이후 증가세가 크게 확대되어 2025년에는 생산가능인구의 5.6%(254만 명)가 '쉬었음' 상태에 있다. 노동시장 이중구조가 심화되고 있으며, 대기업·공공기관 등의 양질의 일자리에는 과다 경쟁이 벌어져 취업이 바늘구멍이고, 중소기업이나 힘든 일자리에는 사람이 없는 상황이다. MZ세대 일부는 취업이 늦어지거나 좌절을 겪으면서 경력단절/취업포기 상태로 남는 사례가 증가하고 있다. 펫돌보미(펫시터), 펫 트레이너, 펫 장례지도사 같은 직업이 부상하여 청년층이 진출하고 있다.

items.title: Trump Administration Federal-State AI Regulation Conflict Intensifies
items.summary: President Trump signed executive order December 11, 2025 casting doubt on enforceability of state AI laws, proposing uniform Federal policy framework that preempts inconsistent state laws. Executive Order directs Attorney General to establish AI litigation task force to challenge state AI laws. Sets up major constitutional confrontation over federalism and AI regulation. New state AI laws effective January 1, 2026 face immediate legal challenges.
items.raw_content: President Trump signed an executive order on December 11, 2025, that casts doubt on the enforceability of state AI laws and proposes to establish a uniform Federal policy framework for AI that preempts state AI laws deemed inconsistent with that policy. The Executive Order directs the Attorney General to establish an AI litigation task force to challenge state AI laws deemed inconsistent with the Executive Order's language. This sets up a major constitutional confrontation over federalism and AI regulation.

items.title: US-Europe AI Regulatory Collision: EU AI Act vs. Trump Light-Touch Approach
items.summary: EU AI Act appears set to collide with Trump administration focused on light-touch regulation. Trump administration posturing to defend American companies against regulation using negotiating powers. As Chinese ambitions toward Taiwan intensify, Congress may be forced in 2026 to reconsider longstanding resistance to federal preemption of state AI regulations. Rhetoric around AI's necessity to national security and geopolitics will crank up.
items.raw_content: The EU AI Act appears set to collide with a Trump administration focused on light-touch regulation, and the Trump administration is posturing that they're going to defend American companies against regulation using their negotiating powers. The rhetoric around AI's necessity to national security and geopolitics will crank up, even as LLMs and generative forms of AI reach the edge of utility. As Chinese ambitions toward Taiwan intensify, Congress may be forced in 2026 to reconsider its longstanding resistance to federal preemption of state AI regulations.

items.title: China ESG Compliance: 2025 Review and 2026 Outlook
items.summary: Chinese companies preparing to publish 2025 sustainability reports by April 30, 2026 deadline. In-scope entities in Australia, Hong Kong, Malaysia, and Singapore scheduled to issue first ISSB-aligned reports in 2026. From 2026 onwards, UK will begin phasing in UK Sustainability Reporting Standards (UK SRS), an ISSB-aligned framework. Regulatory landscape companies face in 2026 looks different than in 2025.
items.raw_content: Chinese companies are preparing to publish their 2025 sustainability reports by the April 30, 2026 deadline. In-scope entities in several jurisdictions, including Australia, Hong Kong, Malaysia, and Singapore, are scheduled to issue their first ISSB-aligned reports in 2026. From 2026 onwards, the UK will begin phasing in the UK Sustainability Reporting Standards (UK SRS), an ISSB-aligned framework. The regulatory landscape companies face in 2026 looks different than it did in 2025, with companies navigating changing requirements across multiple jurisdictions.

items.title: Women's Cardiovascular Health Risk Assessment Advances in 2026
items.summary: By 2026, experts predict ability to characterize women's cardiovascular risk with more biological precision, with early trials incorporating reproductive history and menopause status into risk stratification. Real breakthrough expected in mental health services with better data utilization and integrated care leading to faster access to better-suited treatments.
items.raw_content: By 2026, experts predict the ability to characterize women's cardiovascular risk with more biological precision, with early trials incorporating reproductive history and menopause status into risk stratification. The real breakthrough in 2026 is expected to be in mental health services, with better data utilization and integrated care leading to faster access to better-suited treatments.

items.title: Space Force Expands West Coast Heavy Launch Capabilities
items.summary: US Space Force looking to expand West Coast heavy launch capabilities in 2026. ISRO launching EOS-N1 radar imaging satellite January 11 at 11:47 PM EST from Satish Dhawan Space Centre on PSLV-XL rocket carrying 18 rideshare payloads. Isar Aerospace's Spectrum rocket scheduled to launch several cubesats from ESA's Boost program on January 16 from Andøya Spaceport in Norway.
items.raw_content: Space Force looks to expand West Coast heavy launch capabilities. The Indian Space Research Organization (ISRO) will launch the EOS-N1 mission on January 11 at 11:47 p.m. EST from the Satish Dhawan Space Centre on a PSLV-XL rocket, carrying a radar imaging satellite plus 18 rideshare payloads. On January 16, Isar Aerospace's Spectrum rocket will launch several cubesats from the European Space Agency's Boost program from Andøya Spaceport in Norway.
